Clint Harvey

Son of the Sun

About

Welcome to my corner of the web. My name is Clint Harvey. I credit a very independent childhood with instilling in me the love for problem solving and computers that I later turned into an ability to take complex real world problems and turn them into repeatable processes in code. I have too many dogs. I enjoy taking photographs during my much too frequent trips to the dog park. On this site you’ll find my photos, profiles of my projects, and my general musings on things I’m interested in. Feel free to contact me if you have a project you think I’d be interested in, or for any reason.

Copyrights 2017. All Rights Reserved by Clint Harvey
